Class TaxiJourney

  • java.lang.Object
    • TaxiJourney

  • public class TaxiJourney
extends java.lang.Object
    A TaxiJourney has a location, destination, start time and end time. There is an estimated duration (endTime - startTime) of the journey, as well as initialCharge, chargePerMinute and distance. initialCharge - the initial charge for the journey. currentChargePerKm is the current charge and depends on whether the journey is in day or night time, chargePerKmDay - will be assigned to the currentChargePerKm if the journey took place during the day, chargePerKmNight - will be assigned to the currentChargePerKm if the journey took place during the night. The class has a getFare method which calculates the charge for the journey, using the formula : Fare = initialCharge+chargePerMIn*duration+currentChargePerKm*distance;
    Author:
    raivazova

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TaxiJourney()
      Default constructor sets location and destination to empty strings, initialCharge to default value of 240 pence, chargePerKmDay to default value of 50 pence, chargePerKmNight to default value of 70 pence, chargePerMin to default value of 40pence, start time to default value of "00:00", endTime to default value of "00:00", Duration and distance are set to 0.
      TaxiJourney(java.lang.String location, java.lang.String destination, java.lang.String startTime, java.lang.String endTime, int distance, java.lang.String amPm)
      Custom constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaxiJourney

        public TaxiJourney()
        Default constructor sets location and destination to empty strings, initialCharge to default value of 240 pence, chargePerKmDay to default value of 50 pence, chargePerKmNight to default value of 70 pence, chargePerMin to default value of 40pence, start time to default value of "00:00", endTime to default value of "00:00", Duration and distance are set to 0. amPm (the time of the day)is set to default value of "day".

      • TaxiJourney

        public TaxiJourney(java.lang.String location,
                   java.lang.String destination,
                   java.lang.String startTime,
                   java.lang.String endTime,
                   int distance,
                   java.lang.String amPm)
        Custom constructor. Constructs a TaxiJourney with the given location, destination, distance and amPm. startTime and endTime are set using the setStartTime and setEndTime methods, the reason is to assure that the valid string format is used e.g "HH:mm" Sets initialCharge to default value of 240 pence, chargePerKmDay to default value of 50 pence, chargePerKmNight to default value of 70 pence, chargePerMin to default value of 40pence. Estimates duration of the journey by subtracting startTime form endTime.
        Parameters:
        location - The start location of the journey.
        destination - The destination of the journey
        startTime - The time when the journey started
        endTime - The finish time of the journey
        distance - The distance between location and destination
        amPm - The time of the day when the journey took place ( during the day or the night)

      • setStartTime

        public void setStartTime(java.lang.String startTime)
        Sets startTime to the given value. If using the default constructor and startTime is set, but endTime is still not set, and the toString method is called it would show that duration is 0. Only after the endTime is also set then the duration will be estimated.
        Parameters:
        startTime - the start time of the taxi journey.

      • getEndTime

        public java.lang.String getEndTime()
        Returns the endTime of the taxi JOurney.
        Returns:
        the endTime of the taxi JOurney.

      • setEndTime

        public void setEndTime(java.lang.String endTime)
        Sets endTime to the given value. Once endTime is set, the duration is estimated. That way if endTime is set and the toString method is called it would show the accurate duration.
        Parameters:
        endTime - the end time of the taxi journey.

      • getChargePerMin

      • setAmPm

        public void setAmPm(java.lang.String amPm)
        Sets amPm to the given value. The only two valid strings are "day" or "night".
        Parameters:
        amPm - the time period in which the journey took place (day or night).

      • getCurrentCharge

        public int getCurrentCharge()
        Returns the currentChargePerKM of the taxi journey, depending on the time period (day or night) that the journey took place in.
        Returns:
        the currentChargePerKM of the taxi journey.

      • getDuration

        public int getDuration()
        Returns the duration of the journey. Checks if startTime end endTime are the right format e.g. "HH:mm". Parses startTime and endTime to variables of type Date. Duration is estimated by subtracting etartTime form endTime.
        Returns:
        the duration of the taxi journey.

      • getFare

        public int getFare()
        Returns the calculated fare for the taxi journey. The fare is calculated using the following formula: Fare = initialCharge+distance*currentChargePerKm+duration*chargePerMin.
        Returns:
        the calculated fare for the taxi journey.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a textual representation of the taxi journey.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Compares this Taxi Journey to the specified object. Returns true if and only if the argument is not null and is an TaxiJourney object that has the same location, destination, startTime, endTime, initialCharge, chargePerKmDay, chargePerKmNight, currentChargePerKm, chargePerMin, amPm, distance and duration as this object.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to compare this OrderLine against.
        Returns:
        true if the given object represents a TaxiJourney equivalent to this taxi journey, false otherwise.
